UPDATE %PREFIX%_user_fields SET usf_registration = 1 WHERE (usf_name_intern IN ('FIRST_NAME', 'LAST_NAME', 'EMAIL') OR usf_mandatory = 1) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM %PREFIX%_preferences WHERE prf_name = 'registration_mode' AND prf_value = '1' AND prf_org_id = 1)
UPDATE %PREFIX%_user_fields SET usf_registration = 1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM %PREFIX%_preferences WHERE prf_name = 'registration_mode' AND prf_value = '2' AND prf_org_id = 1)

UPDATE %PREFIX%_preferences pr1 INNER JOIN %PREFIX%_preferences pr2 ON pr2.prf_name = 'registration_mode' AND pr2.prf_value = '0' AND pr1.prf_org_id = pr2.prf_org_id SET pr1.prf_value = '0' WHERE pr1.prf_name = 'registration_enable_module'

UPDATE %PREFIX%_preferences pr1 SET prf_value = '0' FROM %PREFIX%_preferences pr2 WHERE pr2.prf_name = 'registration_mode' AND pr2.prf_value = '0' AND pr1.prf_name = 'registration_enable_module' AND pr1.prf_org_id = pr2.prf_org_id
